job description:
Associate Scientist
San Diego, CA
Pay Rate: $26-29/hour
Associate Scientist will join the Grain Processing Enzymes Product Technical Support team. This position will focus on the bench scale fermentation as well as enzymatic and analytical assays.
Associate Scientist Responsibilities
  • Design and carry out bench scale fermentation process under guidance of scientist
  • Perform enzymatic and analytical assays, analyze data, and troubleshoot experiments
  • Perform high throughput enzyme screening and enzyme activity characterization assays
  • Analyze activity and inhibition kinetics and protein quantitation
  • Summarize, analyze and interpret moderately complex analytical data
  • Provide weekend and after hour coverage – as needed, on a rotating basis – to support business operations
Associate Scientist Requirements
  • BS in Biological Science, Biochemistry or related field with 4+ years of industry experience
  • Hands on experience with analytical instruments such as HPLC, GC and SDS-PAGE
  • Knowledge of starch and sugar chemistry a plus
  • Highly motivated and enjoy working in a team-oriented environment.
